text: <textjump=0.5|1|5>Hello, I'll explain, since a while I feel bad.
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I was<textspeed=30> recommended<textspeed=15> your services so here I am !
<textjump=0.5|1|5>It's been months that I live with my husband and everything is perfect !
<textjump=0.5|1|5>It's happiness, he understands me, he supports me and he's always there to listen to me.
However, it's been HELL since my step-mother came to live at OUR place.
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I suspect<textpause=0.3> she doesn't see our relation as a good thing.
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I think you catch something, please continue
Yes, she keeps throwing some dark looks at me, it's hard for me.
She criticizes my every move. She won't stop saying I'm slack.
I don't find my words, she's the snake in my boot, the fox in the chicken coop, the iceberg in my Titanic.
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Just asking but, did you<color=#6500c5> lost</color> a knife recently?
<textjump=0.5|1|5>15 years of work make you feel those things.
You think there's a link between my step-mother and the knife?
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I'll just sugest you to hide your knife while she stays at your home<textspeed=1>...
Sheâ€™s a thief as well as a pain in the ass, you think?
<textjump=0.5|1|5>Not exactly what... I was thinking but<textspeed=1>...<textspeed=15>  let's get back to you!
Please, make me confident so I can finally stood up to her and make her go!
Oh yes that was my favorite movie as a child!
Oh no! not Titanic, the iceberg is as cold as my step-mother and it's crushing our relationship like the boat!
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I think the Lion King were my favorite movie as a child!
Now think of a place you can relax to.
Not the kitchen, step-mother always criticize my food and she even stole our knifes!
Finally, think of something or someone making you feel good!
<textjump=0.5|1|5>I don't really feel good lately, any idea  ?
Not my step-mother she is the OPPOSITE of a good thing!
You ain't LISTENING to what I'm saying. You're a FRAUD I'm leaving!
You ain't LISTENING to what I'm saying. You're a FRAUD I'm leaving!
At my signal you will now be capable to stand up to your step-mother!
